message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.junit.Assert.*.
'java.util.HashMap' should be separated from previous import group by one line.
Import statement for 'org.junit.Before' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'THIRD_PARTY_PACKAGE' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
